hero.description: Fox Lawyer is the personalized advisory platform where all kinds of individual problems are prevented or solved after an extremely detailed analysis by experts, always protecting the client's privacy and confidentiality.

features.financial_advice_description: Make your salary last until the end of the month
features.financial_advice_details: Planning for your personal finances in the short, medium, and long term.
features.family_relationships_details: Improve communication and resolve conflicts at home.

features.relationship_problems_feature1: How to enhance your interpersonal and intrapersonal intelligence
features.total_confidentiality_details: All consultations are completely confidential and secure.
features.quick_response_description: Get help when you need it
features.quick_response_details: Responses in less than 24 hours for urgent cases.
features.measurable_results_details: Clear metrics to evaluate your personal improvement and growth.

testimonials.title: Join the community
testimonials.description: Discover what our community has to say about their experience with Fox Lawyer.
testimonials.content1: Working on my next SaaS app and I want this to be my full-time job because I'm so excited to put it together. @Fox Lawyer and chill, if you want ðŸ’ª
testimonials.content2: Working with @Fox Lawyer has been one of the best development experiences I've had lately. Incredibly easy to set up, great documentation, and so many hurdles to jump with the competition. Definitely using it in my next projects ðŸ”¥
testimonials.content3: Y'all @Fox Lawyer + @nextjs is amazing! ðŸ™Œ Barely an hour into a proof of concept and I already have most of the functionality in place. ðŸ˜ðŸ˜ðŸ˜
testimonials.content4: Using @Fox Lawyer really impressed me with the power of personalized advice (and sql in general). Despite being a bit dubious about the whole backend as a service thing, I haven't lost anything. The experience feels very robust and secure.
testimonials.content5: And thanks to @Fox Lawyer, I was able to go from idea to feature launch in a matter of hours. Absolutely incredible!
testimonials.content6: @Fox Lawyer Putting a lot of well-explained API queries into self-built documentation is just a brilliant move overall. I like having real-time GraphQL-style.
testimonials.content7: Amazing! Fox Lawyer is awesome. I just ran my first query and it works perfectly. This is worth it. ðŸš€
testimonials.content8: This weekend I made record personal progress ðŸ† in the time I dedicated to creating an application with family advice / permissions, database, cdn, infinite scaling, git push to deploy and free. Thanks to @Fox Lawyer
